Item.name: Heavy Railgun Boarding Shell
Item.description: A hollowed out railgun shell that should be able to fit a person. Somewhat more comfortable than a regular boarding pod due to its size.

Item.description: A heavy box of 400 explosive Chaingun rounds.

Item.name: Mining Laser Cell
Item.description: Heavy non-rechargable capacitor which supplies the isolated power modulation needed to drive an acoustic laser system. The casing includes large heatsinks to accommodate the unit's tendancy to heat up during extended use.
